name: Halloween Tale
description:
This Halloween, help Michael and the Gravediggers to stop the evil zombie pirate that is devastating the cemetery.

Retrieve Ancient Relic Fragments by completing games of skill to allow the skeletons to rest in peace again.
Take on a duel of wits with the evil pirate and banish him from the graveyard forever.

Game features:

• Three fun and chilling game modes to be unlocked as you progress through the story

 • A funny and terrifying story 

• 6 challenging levels to test your skill, each with 1 hidden trophy

 • Aesthetic "scary spooky skeletons"

Languages:

- English

- Español
